website_summaries.verdict: A nice rubber soled boot that delivers a stylish look in comfort.
pros: The rubber sole and low heel makes them a good first boot
Comfortable and serviceable for riding and hiking
They will do the job for being on your feet all day, but still look great
cons: Getting the fit right can be tricky

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Got her a little early which is nice. They are a bit darker then what the picture shows but I like them way better in person. The design is super cute and not to flashy and the fit is perfect size 7 is what I usually wear and that's what I ordered. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: gabby

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous. I bought them for my daughter for her senior pics. This is our first venture into cowboy boots so I'm glad these were it. We both have very wide calfs and wide feet too and these fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Nice slip on boot
customer_reviews.text: Love these, this is my second pair and when these are warn out pretty sure will get them again. Love the rubber bottom for no slip, short heel as i wear spurs for 3 of the horses I ride is great...I have a very high instep so just a little hard to slide on but after one day of wearing they began to get comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Marvetta Wotton

customer_reviews.title: great boot
customer_reviews.text: I have issues with plantar fasciitis and tendon issues in my feet. I am able to wear these boots all day long without any real foot pain which is amazing. This boot has lasted me over 2 years. I even purchased another pair for my little sister who works on a goat farm.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda A. Goolsby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots! Love
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots! Love, love, love these... Hiked miles up the mountains in them, rode horses, never any foot pain, and I suffer from plantat fasciitis. These are the boots I'll be wearing everyday!
customer_reviews.author: CJM+MSM

customer_reviews.title: Best boot I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best boot I have ever owned, have had them for almost a year and a half now! Usually get blisters when first breaking in new boots, but no problem with these. Still have help up extremely well, I wear them about 3 times a week and they still look and feel great. I use them for hunting, outdoor/barn work around the house and have the nice looks to wear with a nice pair of jeans when I'm going out, very versatile. Size is true to fit, if you have arch problems you will need arch supports for these boots because they really have none. Other then that I love Justin boots!
customer_reviews.author: NatPat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but painful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots...they look just like in the picture. I ordered size 7, which is my regular size. Even though, the reviews said the boots ran big they we're to tight. Length is perfect, to narrow to get in the boot and then lose around your ankles and very tight on the upper part of my foot. I am 125 pounds, 5'5 tall.
customer_reviews.author: sandy l.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and awesome color 👍
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I wear size 9 boot and that's the size I went with and they fit perfect! The seller was very fast at free shipping (got them in a couple of days). Beautiful boots the color is perfect, I wanted a natural look with just a bit of color, perfect 😄
customer_reviews.author: Stacy H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boots!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit!! Very happy, and the blue really makes them stand out. Very nice for the price!! Had a pair of Ariat boots that I recently got rid of. I’d had them for 6 years. These are a perfect replacement and upgrade! Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Canty

customer_reviews.title: My thought was they would stretch to a good fit and not be too loose
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 1/2 size too small and as expected, they were tight. My thought was they would stretch to a good fit and not be too loose. Unfortunately, one foot is slightly larger than the other so I couldn't get my foot in all the way. I was able to exchange them at a local retailer for the a 1/2 size bigger and they are perfect! I love love love these boots! I wear them almost every day all day. And I get so many compliments. I will absolutely buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Never disappointed with Justin's
customer_reviews.text: Looks better than the picture. Wish they had a wider size but I new this when ordering so I cannot dis them for this. They broke in well and feel fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Heel was almost like foam. These would not hold up long of ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Really cheap leather on foot and top is not all leather. Piping is also not leather. Heel was almost like foam. These would not hold up long of used for regular riding or worn with spurs. Might work for someone looking for fashion boots but the square toe is very wide and masculine. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: ****LOVE THEM****
customer_reviews.text: Originally posted:Mar 2014- Personally I went to a boot barn to try them on in person before ordering. The BEST price in town was through amazon, they arrived on time and I am very satisfied with these boots. VERY comfy and go with everything! UPDATE: it's march 2015, very durable and still comfortable! I heard these boots were not durable but the pair I have still look great. I due use leather care products once a week on them, give or take.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi Omel

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, but prefer a different style
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I will be returning these boots. The toe turned out to be much more square than the picture implied. As much as I wanted to keep them, I just don't prefer that kind of look. I will look at other Justin boots, though, because these fit well, the leather wouldn't have needed much break in, and the colors and detail were great.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Comfort of Justin Boots
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these boots, and Justin's are ALWAYS COMFORTABLE. The only complaint is the color is a shade lighter than expected. Other than that, perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Real boots
customer_reviews.text: I had tried these on in a local store but could not order one size bigger there but could on Amazon. They fit as I expected. I usually wear a 12. I ordered an 11 which fits great except being a big snug across the forefoot which is normal for an 11 with me. They seem to be well made, comfortable boot that you can actually work in not just use as a fashion statement (but they are nice enough to be able to make one).
customer_reviews.author: Teaje

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, and they're pretty too
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these boots a LOT in the past couple of months, and they've broken in really well. My only complaint is that the left boot, for some reason, is a little stiffer around my ankle than the right; hopefully it softens up with time. I wear these to work and I wear them to ride. So far so good, and they're pretty too!
customer_reviews.author: Emma W

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this boot. I wear a size 8 and they fit true to size. Very comfortable. Good support and can wear them everyday. I purchased as a riding boot but I wear them everywhere. Also fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the note that comes with the boots warning you ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to take to shoe repair place and pay $25.00 to have them stretched. Did not like the note that comes with the boots warning you that something in them may be cancerous. That should have been mentioned in the discription of the boots. Love the look tho. Wearing them with pride anyway, as I have had many compliments on them when and while I do wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Great price very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots these are my all day everyday boots they're very comfortable and holding up very well
customer_reviews.author: B. Abbas

customer_reviews.title: The boot fit fine when it was on
customer_reviews.text: The boot fit fine when it was on, and was really cute. However, the top was so small that I struggled to get it on and then didn't think I was going to be able to get it back off. I was concerned by that so I did return them.
customer_reviews.author: kindleuser

customer_reviews.title: Fit was just right.
customer_reviews.text: I was leery ordering without trying on first but these fit perfect. I wear a size 8 in heels and tennis shoes and I ordered a size 8 in boots. I like the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: Busyperson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality that is hard to find these days
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter had a pair of these in the past but the dog tried to eat them recently.She took her birthday money and replaced them. She has a wide foot and has no problem with comfort or fit. Excellent quality that is hard to find these days. Ordered a size smaller & they were comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so comfortable. I have problem feet and these boots don't irriate any part of my foot. I usually can't be on my feet for long periods of time but find these boots have such comfortable support I can be on my feet longer than usual. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: CM Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Would buy again...probably woud buy my true size which is a 6 i ordered a 6.5 thinking i'd wear thick socks sometimes, there would be plenty of room for socks & having them true to size. The top part of my left boot was tight when i 1st put on but after a few hours it loosed up.
customer_reviews.author: YoMomma_38

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They were a bit big on me so I exchanged for a smaller size that fit perfectly. The return was easy and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: These boots are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome! I have bought 4 pair of boots and returned them all. these are keepers. They are comfortable and cute as can be. I bought them for the barn to work with horses and have gotten water and all kinds of goodies on them and they look great. They break in easy and the square toe is really comfortable. I have a big foot...size 10 and these are true to size, I could wear them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Krickitt

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff at the top of the boot and created blisters but after a few wears became smoother
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lager

customer_reviews.title: I ordered my regular shoe size and could not get ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my regular shoe size and could not get my foot in either boot. Returned them and I would get a size bigger. They are REALLY cute boots though...Wish they fit
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: The toe box is way small, the leather felt cheap and dry. I returned them and purchased the Stampedes silver collection which I've worn for three years. I have a high instep, so I was frustrated in these boots not working out.
customer_reviews.author: Holly  Farrar

customer_reviews.title: The fit is perfect and go on easily
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift for my daughter for riding. She LOVES them. So much so, she's been wearing them everywhere. The fit is perfect and go on easily. They look great with jeans. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Who Knows

customer_reviews.title: BEST BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The only complaint I have is the rubbed the inside of my leg at the top for a while after I purchased because of the way they are packaged in the box but I got that to warm up and straighten out so they are great! Love the fit, comfort, steel toe is safe and not to heavy or burdensome!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom/Business Owner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I love boots, very comfy for standing on your feet for 12 hours a day on cement.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle's Luxury Hair and Skin Care

customer_reviews.title: A Little Snug
customer_reviews.text: This style runs very tight across the foot. I order my Justins online every time and always order 7.5M. These run slightly smaller due to the style. I would recommend moving up a half size. I love my Justins. I had to wear these in the shower and then wear them dry to stretch them out to comfortable but still a great boot.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn McCallie

customer_reviews.title: Do they run small?
customer_reviews.text: Lovely boot, but maybe they were sized small because I bought them for a granddaughter but tried them on myself to judge size. They fit me, two sizes smaller than what I Ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Tight as heck
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 1/2 size up from my normal and they fit much tighter then any other brand I've had. Half the time my foot won't even go in. I tried stretching them and it didn't help. If I do get them on, my feet hurt and go numb after 20 mins. I love the way they look, if I could only wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Too large, uncomfortable. Also can not return for free. Read the fine print...
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots! Easy to get on the foot. just a tad to big in the heal. but still really comfortable!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: theduitsmans

customer_reviews.title: I love the detail and they are comfortable for all day ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought I was going to have to return these due to sizing... I love the detail and they are comfortable for all day wear. I just wear thicker socks with them. I have narrow feet but these worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: mcragun

customer_reviews.title: Boots were Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are perfect, they are comfortable, broke in quickly. Feel good - look dressy yet perfect with jeans. I love them and the small amount of turquoise accent stitching is just right. Not too fancy, not too plain!
customer_reviews.author: Teeter

customer_reviews.title: COMFY
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear a size 9, but my friend told me they stretch out once they break in, so I got an 8.5. At first they were hard to put on but after the first few wears they break in, they're very comfortable to wear all day. Don't usually like camo but these are cute! Get a lot of compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: EmilyAnn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They are comfy and the colors are vibrant. My only issue is with some of the embroidery where threads are stocking out.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidiann

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots 👌🏻
customer_reviews.text: I got the Realtree Camo and they were exactly what I expected them to be and looked just like the image on Amazon. They fit perfectly and I got the medium width because my feet aren't small but they aren't big either and they fit great. I got my normal shoe size of 8.5, and that's what I ordered in boot size. Great for outside work, great to show off, great for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: misty

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size larger than you normally would wear!
customer_reviews.text: First off, the picture does not match the boot pictured! If you normally wear a 6.5 order a size 7. The ankle of the boot was terribly tight and the toe was tight, once I tried the 7 it fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Rowell

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots!
customer_reviews.text: They were a little bit tight at first but after wearing them a few times, they are very comfortable! I ordered my true size. Boots clean up easily and are very cute. I wear them in the barn and riding my horse but when I clean them up, they are also cute enough to wear out! Love these boots and would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: momofffive

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very comfortable and stylish. I can't wait to wear them when I go horseback riding.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Justin Gypsy boots are the best!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable boots I own! I had another pair of Justin Gypsies, and wore them several years, until they literally fell apart! They are my go to boot every time. Never pinch or hurt my feet!
customer_reviews.author: KS girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so comfortable. Good for working on the ground and for riding all day. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YAY!!!
customer_reviews.text: i hesitated because i found them on another site for 30 dollars more. im glad i waited. they are a little snug across the top of the foot but not painful and i know they will relax as i wear them. im so glad i waited, thanks a ton! i love love love them
customer_reviews.author: mary bell

customer_reviews.title: I had a bad foot injury and have hardware still in my foot
customer_reviews.text: I had a bad foot injury and have hardware still in my foot. I can't risk an injury from my horse stepping on my toes. These boots look good and have steel toes,
customer_reviews.author: C. Scarpitti

customer_reviews.title: Cool boots.
customer_reviews.text: Really cool looking boots, but came in a bit bigger than expected. And they came in the actual boot box so it kind of ruined the Christmas surprise. I'll know better next year
customer_reviews.author: Cpl. Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Still a good boot.
customer_reviews.text: They are quality. Downside is Justin's are made in China as far as I know. Still a good boot.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Foam style heal was not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: golilmama

customer_reviews.title: Not the fit I expect from Justin
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair of Justins that fit perfect from the first day on. These just felt weird and stiff. Also, the leather was very plasticy looking to me. I ended up sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopping Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I have not worn them yet but they are made vrey nicely. Good boots I will know how they feel after i wear them
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Cowgirl Forever
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality and fit of my Justin boots. I wear a medium 8 and these fit true to size. I have received many compliments when wearing my Justin boots.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Culbert

customer_reviews.title: Adorable  boots.
customer_reviews.text: Love them If you ever want to kick it western style this is a good choice Reasonable price very high quality. Looks good with jeans or a boho skirt. I will be wearing these for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: L. Child

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic choice for beautiful well-made stylish Justin boots.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my granddaughter for Christmas and she couldn't have been happier. A perfect fit with beautiful detailing, and a gorgeous color combination were right on target for twenty-year-old-old hard to please gal. These boots are also well-made. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MimmyJ.

customer_reviews.title: They are more for jeans but really love the pattern
customer_reviews.text: They fit well. If you're buying the square toe it fits true to size. If you are buying the point toe I would order up. I thought they were dress boots. They are more for jeans but really love the pattern. They are comfortable as they have a rubber sole. More for casual then to wear with a dress though.
customer_reviews.author: kristina croan

customer_reviews.title: Narrow shaft
customer_reviews.text: Narrow shaft but beautiful sturdy boot otherwise. Too bad they did not fit my overly large calves. I went with a 6 " and that made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting boots.
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots for Christmas. I absolutely love these boots. They fit me perfectly. They are the most comfortable boots that I have ever owned. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... to order boots online but the deal was too good to pass up
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order boots online but the deal was too good to pass up. I wear 7.5-8.5 depending on the shoe and I went with my gut and ordered the 7.5. They fit perfectly with any thickness of sock. The stitching is beautiful, the leather is gorgeous and I've worn them for doing work and dressed up. My favorite boots I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Merchant

customer_reviews.title: I am in LOVE with these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I just got these and wore them all day while I was cleaning house, running errands and walking the dog and my feet still felt good in the evening. I absolutely love the design and the colors, looks good with skirts or jeans. I'm 43, and these are age-appropriate boho. They were ever-so-slightly tight across the widest part of my foot with my SmartWool socks, but I have Flintstone feet that are widest across my rather short toes. They loosened up within a day and were otherwise very comfortable right out of the box. I normally can't wear pointy toed shoes due to my wedge shaped feet, and the square toe on these is perfect. These are my new favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Flora Knitingale

customer_reviews.title: Great boot! Bought as a gift for my sister ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boot! Bought as a gift for my sister and she loves them. Fits great and excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B

customer_reviews.title: Great price on Justin boot
customer_reviews.text: Great Justin Boot. Comfortable. I've been looking for another casual, yet stylish boot and am pleased with this purchase. I think because the toe is not pointed you can get your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: prime shopper

customer_reviews.title: Even More Beautiful in Person
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit very nicely, and I usually have a wide foot. The stitch detailing is even more beautiful in person than it looked online. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mckenna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hreat boots just what I wonted the fit was just right
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cool!
customer_reviews.text: New as listed, arrived fast and the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: Kirby H

customer_reviews.title: Justin Boots
customer_reviews.text: Justin boots rock. You can play hard in them. Get them muddy. Clean them up and they look brand new. Ready to go out on the town!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Duncan

customer_reviews.title: I wear a 9 so that was what I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9 so that was what I ordered but my toes hit the end. I have reordered a 10.
customer_reviews.author: aa

customer_reviews.title: Justin boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. They fit great. Would love to see these in pink light pink, not bright pink. Birthday gift .
customer_reviews.author: maria rummel

customer_reviews.title: but other than that they were very nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Corners of the toe were a bit more squared off than the post lead me to believe, but other than that they were very nice and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Price

customer_reviews.title: I love the style and color but they look like men's ...
customer_reviews.text: The toe was very square. I love the style and color but they look like men's workboots when you look right down on them. I had to send them back for something more pointed toe.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Saved $30 by ordering from Amazon. These boots are adorable and they are VERY comfortable, with great arch support. Very pretty color and love the teal accents.
customer_reviews.author: Yajie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable boots. The color is darker than what I expected, but they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Dazite

customer_reviews.title: The boots were great, but simply did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have a high instep and thicker calf, so I have problems with fit on boots. The boots were great, but simply did not work for me. Wish they had because I liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great boots
customer_reviews.text: These are for my 14 yr old daughter. They are comfortable and stylish for a great price. I definatley reccomend them for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they hurt until I got them broke in. I wear these most the time!
customer_reviews.author: Lins

customer_reviews.title: and she loved them, but like many boots they were too ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife, and she loved them, but like many boots they were too big. She needs a smaller pair, especially since most of the time the leather loosens up.
customer_reviews.author: geoffrey brown

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color, style and toe of this boot, however they were uncomfortable and the leather was faded on the entire side of one boot.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: beautiful boots
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. Never have gone wrong with a Justin boot. Delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Madiebs

customer_reviews.title: The boots are beautiful and appear well made
customer_reviews.text: The boots are beautiful and appear well made. Unfortunately I will be returning them for exchange as they are too small, even though I ordered based on the measurements on the size chart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: feel great on the feet
customer_reviews.text: The heel fit is a little sloppy but I plan to put in some inserts. I can not believe how comfortable they are. My feet are always a problem and these feel just like slippers.....was going to a western party and I am so glad I bought them
customer_reviews.author: MomLee

customer_reviews.title: Loving these !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these can't wait for my wedding.. very comfy and fit how a boot should true to size second pair Iv bought from Justin Boots
customer_reviews.author: Midnight3

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really good, and very comfortable..totally happy happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great! They are comfortable boots wouldn't pick any other boots
customer_reviews.author: edric d.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: 1st time purchasing Justin boots an I went by the same as an ariat boot. My mistake but still fit good. A tad loose but exceptable :-)
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautuful and comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved them. So very comfortable. Light as can be.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my daughter. She loves them, they fit true to size and are well made boots that are comfortable. No seams digging into your foot anywhere and easy on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Riviera

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are perfect. They fit a little small in the width & they're still a little tight overall but I'm hoping after I've worn them for a while they will stretch to fit my feet. Besides that though they're beautiful, the perfect height, & they perfect that cute "cowgirl' look. (:
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Hess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lasted my daughter 2 yrs for 1st pair so I got another pair for her
customer_reviews.author: Hukill, PA

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these boots but they tend to run a little ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these boots but they tend to run a little big. I really wish I would have ordered a 1/2 size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: JBL

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: A fabulous birthday gift (as stated by the recipient) that fit perfectly and looks great. I ordered it in her usual shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Lainee

customer_reviews.title: ... 1/2 sizes then my wife would be so much happier
customer_reviews.text: I wish they made 1/2 sizes then my wife would be so much happier
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the boys but a little on the large side. Could have gone with 7.5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful! Worth the money & looking to purchase another color!
customer_reviews.author: sowen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots and service was fast. We are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenda

customer_reviews.title: These boots are incredibly comfortable and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very fast. These boots are incredibly comfortable and beautiful. No break in time either. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: kristyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wife loves them and the color. She did wish they were a little bit taller
customer_reviews.author: G. Segura

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and oh so cute
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. They are not only adorable they are a lot taller than normal Justin Gypsy boots. They also fit my somewhat larger calves. A win I have to say. Plus you cannot beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rhodes

product_meta.title: Justin Boots Women's Gypsy Collection 12" Soft Toe
product_meta.description: From the Justin Gypsy Cowgirl Collection comes this leather Gypsy boot. This sassy boot features a smooth brown leather foot with saddle vamp under a bright purple, embroidered 8\" leather shaft. Mesh lining. Single stitched welt. Easy-on pull straps and updated square toe profile. Imported
feature_bullets: Clever color choices, stylish perforations, and meticulously crafted stitching define the Gypsy Collection boot from Justin.
